name: 20201001_151034.life
description:
There is a man looking the brochure for the short film competition awarding the winner with 10.000$. The man has a friend that is quite talented for acting, but the man sees a little problem. Short film must be recorded at midnight but his friend chosen as the actor for the short film is afraid of the darkness. Because he witnessed to some scary events when he was a child. Let's see how the man will convince his friend

Controls:

T -  Think (to continue the conversation on computer screen with our man(he has a problem ) )

WASD - Move 

HOLD Right Mouse Button - Change Throw Angle

Left Mouse Button - Throw

U. Arda , H.Kerem

Special Thanks to İ.Atakan for dubbing

--Other

(Other assets will be updated. Some assets are ready.)
